props.itemsPerPageAllText: Text for 'All' option in items-per-page dropdown.
props.itemsPerPageOptions: Array of options to show in the items-per-page dropdown.
props.showCurrentPage: Show current page number between prev/next icons.

slots.prepend: Adds content to the empty space in the footer.
slots.page-text: Defines content for the items-per-page text.
